absolute gem! Fair warning however: this game involves a lot of logic and reasoning. If you aren't into that stuff then you probably won't enjoy it.

I got it in a bundle for 3$ together with Portal 2. For this little money, don't even think about it, it is absolutely worth it. Even for the normal price, unless you have severe money problems, it is still worth it.

Considering this game was made in 2007, it is stunningly well made. Graphics, of course, can't compare to modern top games, but they are defenitely acceptable.

Great game, the puzzles aren't incredibly difficult but they require you to think while still offering several different ways to solve many of them, gives a nice feeling of freedom. Very funny dialogue. It's very short, can easily be beaten in a weekend or even one day.
игра топ, но она короткая, так сказать знакомство с механиками игры. Вторая часть ещё лучше, более разнообразный геймплей и она будет подлинее. Игры обязательны для прохождения. 10/10

Holy. Crap. I understand now why Portal is such a legendary game. The mechanics, even 13 years later, felt new and interesting. The puzzles were challenging, and the story was mysterious. I laughed, and cried. Portal is everything a game should strive to be.
